###Episode S02E19 Discussion
#"Salivation Army"
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Original air date - 10/9c April 12th, 2016
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Working on a mission together, Liv, Babineaux and Major crash Vaughn's Super Max Rager party; Ravi is upset when Blaine reaches out to Peyton for help.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Directed by - [John Kretchmer](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0470971/) Written by - [Diane Ruggiero-Wright](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0749461/)

WRITING.TITLE: Regarding posts/discussion about the show outside the discussion threads and Spoilers
WRITING.TEXT:
It has came to my attention that many people are not using the spoiler tag and properly having the correct title that can void any spoiler information.
We do have subreddit rules regarding any spoilers and although a thread might have been missed, we still need people to follow it.
I will start suspending people for a short period of time for not following the rules from now on.
Also we would appreciate it if people report any posts that pops up not following the spoiler guideline or breaking any subreddit rules.
Since this sub doesn't have much traffic beside the day that a new episode airs, we don't frequent it so we need people to also report any posts we might have missed.
*Also sorry about the thread that was up over 1 day with a spoiler in the title*
**tldr; Please follow the subreddit rules and anybody that breaks it will now start getting suspension that will lead into a ban. Also report any thread or comments you deem has broken the rules.**

###Episode S02E17 Post Episode Discussion
#"Reflections of the Way Liv Used to Be"
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Original air date - 9/8c April 5th, 2016
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Liv and Babineaux investigate the death of a highly competitive student; Liv becomes more like the girl she used to be after consuming the victim's brain; Blaine looks to Ravi for help.

WRITING.TITLE: **Spoilers**Coming Soon from Funko: Civil War **Spoilers**
**Spoilers** Coming Soon from Funko: Civil War **Spoilers**
Upcoming January Hot Topic Exclusives + Pre-Releases!
Upcoming Toy Story Pop Ride! RC Car with Woody! No Glam shot!
Sailor Moon Line update! No Glam shots!
***SPOILERS*** Some info on the Civil War based on Funko Pops list leak ***SPOILERS***
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys,
I am from the Funko pops community and there was a leaked from a website that showcased unfinished glam shots of pop designs for upcoming movies and Funko has worked on taking them down but I did manage to get a list of the Civil War movie pops of the first wave and it contained a small plot about a certain hero.
Keep in mind, a lot of the future releases always get leak before the intended street date about upcoming movies, Star Wars was one of them.
Source on the website: http://www.southernhobby.com/search-results-gallery?name=Pop%20Marvel desc releaseStartDate releaseEndDate orderDueStartDate orderDueEndDate productType=3 category=0 subcategory=0 subSubcategory=0 subSubSubcategory=0 isAvailable=False search=True solicitationDate
But here is the list if you care about and you will see at the end of a certain somebody's ability in the movie.
[Source Imgur Mirror](http://imgur.com/a/BtbAY)
**The List**
Captain America
Iron Man
War Machine
Black Widow
Agent 13
Scarlet Witch
Black Panther
Crossbones
Winter Soldier
**6" Giant Man (Ant Man)**

WRITING.TITLE: ***SPOILERS*** Preview of the first line of Captain America Civil War!
WRITING.TEXT:
You guys might remember my post from front page about the Zootopia glams and pop line list well the following was also found on there but was taken down by Funko later.
http://www.southernhobby.com/products/detail?p=35767 Only the Mystery mini list is up now on there.
I got a preview list of the pops that were on there and be warned, it has some spoiler to some of the plot to the movie. Sadly still no Falcon in the first wave.
[Imgur Mirror of the list:](http://imgur.com/a/BtbAY)
**The List**
Captain America
Iron Man
War Machine
Black Widow
Agent 13
Black Panther
Crossbones
Winter Soldier
Scarlet Witch
6" Giant Man (Ant Man)
Also HT is supposed to get an Iron Man exclusive, was spotted in their system a while back:
**Battle Damaged Iron Man/Unmasked Iron Man?**
**Falcon Rumors:**
Hot Topic Exclusive/MCC
